title: Daolaogui

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Take over a player's body and control them into another. You'll learn your first target's role and feedback. Your target will send a deafening scream at whoever you control them into, roleblocking the secondary target and preventing them from communicating the next day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Upon spawning in the game, you'll shroud the Town in violent rain and roaring winds. Players will only be able to visit targets up to **six** houses away from them. Spirits and Astral users aren't affected by this. Your powers will wear off by the start of Night 4 and this attribute will no longer apply.
- Each day, for every player who whispers to you, you may use your ability one extra time the following night.

desc:
Post 678
*"This rain... the wind... I fear we're being haunted by a **Daolaogui**. Cover your ears."*
